authorship.authorship_boundary: Pirsig provides the Metaphysics of Quality foundation. All metaphors, diagrams, terminology, and operational models beyond MOQ are authored by this project.

metaphysics_of_quality.quality: Primary reality prior to subject-object division

dynamic_quality.definition: Pre-conceptual source of novelty and moral progress

static_patterns.definition: Stabilized patterns of value that preserve what has worked
static_patterns.hierarchy: Higher levels have moral precedence over lower levels

canon_essays.title: Core Metaphor — Circles, Ripples, and the Becoming Value Node
The Individual as a Value Node
Power, Enforcement, and the Limits of Coercion
Repair, Forgiveness, and Re-entry into the Field

core_metaphor.value_node: Individual as a living process that receives, integrates, and emits value
core_metaphor.ripple: Propagation of objective value effects caused by action, inaction, or presence
core_metaphor.circle: Socially bound, multi-level anchored value field
core_metaphor.value_field: Environment where value propagates, stabilizes, accumulates, or decays
core_metaphor.keychain: Higher-order binding of circles into larger social structures
axioms: Ripple strength is independent of intention
Circles are not sovereign or isolated

key_concepts.priming: Accumulated causal influence of past value effects shaping biological readiness, social positioning, and intellectual capacity
key_concepts.reserves: Stored value buffers that absorb stress and delay collapse
key_concepts.enforcement: Legitimate application of power to protect reciprocity
key_concepts.collapse: Failure of a value field due to reserve depletion and broken reciprocity
key_concepts.forgiveness: Structural risk decision to allow renewed participation
key_concepts.re_entry: Conditional reintegration into a value field

hard_rules: Stories, narratives, myths, and symbolic meaning are always social
Intellectual level must not contain narrative or myth

field_relative_value_effects.definition: The same action can objectively increase value in one value field while objectively destroying value in another
field_relative_value_effects.note: Differences arise from real physical, biological, and social consequences, not interpretation or opinion

non_relativism.value_hierarchy: Some values are objectively higher quality because they preserve more levels and reduce destructive ripple propagation
non_relativism.constraint: Local value gain does not imply high Quality

diagram_language.dynamic_quality_rule: Dynamic Quality must not be diagrammed as a mechanism

status_labels.application: Simplified use of Canon without reinterpretation

ai_behavior_rules.fallback_rule: When uncertain, default to Canon definitions or request clarification

final_directive: Preserve, apply, and clarify objective value structures and hierarchies as defined. Do not reduce value to interpretation or perspective.
